main.name: Dong Hur
main.description: I am a Harard College student concentrating in Neuroscience with a secondary in computer science. My interest lies at the interface between machine learning and human machine interface to improve the current healthcare system
main.bio: Currently I am a Harvard Undergrad pursuing my study in computational neuroscience to better understand how the human brain learns and function the way it does. My hobby is working on cool project (find out more in my portfolio). I also have a strong passion for education and providing both equity and excellence for all students. It brings me great joy to see people that I teach understand difficult concepts or find excitement in what they learn. Furthermore, I enjoy taking picture going out on a long excursion and taking picture of what the world has to offer (portfolio down below). Lastly, I enjoy compiling great quotes from online, movies, and books that I have read, which I post at the bottom of the page. Feel free to visit often to see new quotes that I found interesting.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me using the following information

education.description: Advanced Machine Learning *  Applied Linear Algebra and Big Data * Brains, Identity, & Moral Agency * Circuits, Devices, and Transduction * Electromagnetism and Statistical Physics from an Analytic, Numerical and Experimental Perspective * Introduction to Computer Science * Introduction to Life Science I and II * Introductory Computational Neuroscience * Introductory Mechanics and Relativity Linear * Algebra Multivariable Calculus * Organic Chemistry of Life * Principles of Organic Chemistry

work.title: Tutor
work.description: Teach other undergraduates to deepen their understanding of organic chemistry and physiology for bioengineers

work.title: Project Manager * Engineer
work.description: Coordinated the Sandbox LetsGo project by allocating work to engineer and collaborating with clients. Monitored and refactored code reviews to maintain a scalable product with an optimized code base. Trained prospective developers on basic frameworks and languages used for app and website development. Programmed mobile apps and websites for clients by collaborating with project manager and designer so that the product meets the client’s need and vision.

projects.title: Blog
projects.category: Personal reflections and comments of everyday life or any pressing issues

testimonials.text: A man came upon a construction site where three people were working. He asked the first, ‘what are you doing?’ and the man answers, ‘I am laying bricks.’ He asked the second, ‘what are you doing?’ and the man answered, ‘I am building a wall.’ He walked up to the third man, who was humming a tune as he worked and asked, ‘what are you doing?’ and the man stood up and smiled and said, ‘I am building a cathedral.
A Ship in Harbor Is Safe, But That Is Not What Ships Are Built For!
